name: Luminary (Dane Byrd, Rhia_a, GalacticCobalt, BLUE110601, fastfist)
name_original: Luminary (Dane Byrd, Rhia_a, GalacticCobalt, BLUE110601, fastfist)
description:
A maelstrom envelopes the lighthouses of an island off
the coast of Nova Scotia. You, a lighthouse keeper, notice that the neighboring lighthouse just down the coast is dark and seemingly unmanned. You set out to discover what happened but a pitch black forest stands between you and the lighthouse.

Light your path through the woods and find clues as to the fate of the lighthouse keeper.
